entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
